title: OPEC+ Compensation Cuts Triple as Key Producers Move to Rein in Oversupply

title: Uzbekistan’s Water Crisis Pushes the Country Toward Solar and Wind
summary: An acute water shortage in Uzbekistan seems to have a silver lining.
